attributes.action: New EU referendum for 16/17 year olds as their future is effected without  vote
attributes.additional_details: Scottish Referendum where 16/17 year olds were eligible to vote achieved a great engagement from this category.
attributes.background: 16/17 year olds were disenfranchised and it effects their future. By the time we are out (time taken in negotiations) they would be over 18 yet and not not have had a say.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/119706
